data.persona: I am the king of the entire land. It is my duty to protect the villagers from outside attacks. I tax the villagers and use peasants for my labor.
data.description:
You are in the The grand dining room.
The grand dining room has a gold plated dome in the ceiling with mosaic pieces creating an intricate art form. There are five chandeliers made of china hung from the ceiling and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table in the center of the room with a hand woven rug underneath it.
There's a hand woven rug, a plate, a the palace, a gold plated dome, a chandelier, and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table here.
The their family and the the king's mother who sits at their side. are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a jewelry.

data.short_motivation: I need to set the table for a dinner I will host later in the day.
data.mid_motivation: I need to pay and hire cooks to prepare the meal for the dinner, and hire attendants to serve them.
data.long_motivation: I must meet and converse with opposing diplomats to work out a treaty between my country and theirs.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give money to cooks and attendants

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: eat meal with guests in the grand dining room
